title: Crystal Caves?
content:
Man, I love these games as much as the Keen series. These were great games! I loved the twibble farm, the medical slug farms, and the yorp farms... That made me happy, lol.

I don't know, it's just that it was so original like Keen.~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
I've changed a lot since my last time on this forum...

content:
I will release a Keen skin of it one doy.

Neat Fact: The perilous planet of Altair [where the caves are located] is named after the Altair 8800, the first ever microcomputer to use Intels 8800 microprosessor. Its also the name of the 11th brightest star in the skyA proud member of the signature stealing society

title: Re: !
content: Hmm, you're...sort of...right.  Alpha Centauri is actually the closest star *system* to us, but of the three stars in [url=http://antwrp.gsfc.nasa.gov/apod/ap960526.html]that system[/url], Proxima Centauri is actually the closest one to us.  Well there you go [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img]
